mapper.select:
select device,newcount,launchcount from (select CONCAT(brand,'/',device) as device,sum(new_user_count) as newcount,sum(launch_user_count) as launchcount FROM la_device_stat
appid=${appid}
and (device like '%${queryname}%' or brand like '%${queryname}%')
group by device )a order by newcount desc

select sum(new_user_count) as newcount,sum(launch_user_count) as launchcount FROM la_device_stat
appid=${appid}
and date >='${date1}'
AND date <='${date2}'

select * from (select device,newcount,launchcount,date from (select CONCAT('${brand}','/',device) as device, sum(new_user_count) as newcount,sum(launch_user_count) as launchcount,date FROM ( select ds.brand,ds.device,ds.date, sum(new_user_count) as new_user_count,sum(launch_user_count) as launch_user_count FROM la_device_stat ds LEFT JOIN la_device_setting dt on ds.device=dt.device
ds.appid=${appid}
and ds.device='${device}'
and (ds.brand='${brand}' or dt.fn='${brand}' )
and ds.date >='${date1}'
AND ds.date <='${date2}'
group by ds.device,date )a group by date)a order by date desc ) st where st.newcount!=0
mapper.insert: insert into tmp_ds(id,brand,device,fn) select * from la_device_setting b where b.fn!=''
mapper.select:
select device,newcount,launchcount from ( select case WHEN b.brand = a.brand THEN CONCAT(b.fn,'/',a.device) ELSE CONCAT(a.brand,'/',a.device) end as device, sum(new_user_count) as newcount,sum(launch_user_count) as launchcount FROM la_device_stat a left join la_device_setting b on a.device=b.device and a.brand=b.brand
a.date >='${date1}'
AND a.date <='${date2}'
AND a.appid=${appid}
and (a.device like '%${queryname}%' or a.brand like '%${queryname}%')
group by a.device,a.brand )a order by newcount desc

select device,newcount,launchcount from (select CONCAT(brand,'/',device) as device,sum(new_user_count) as newcount,sum(launch_user_count) as launchcount FROM la_device_stat
date >='${date1}'
AND date <='${date2}'
AND appid=${appid}
group by device )a order by newcount desc limit 10
